mapper.select: select * from (select n.*,row_number() over(order by notice_no desc) rnum from sp_notice n) join sp_member m on mem_no_fk = m.member_no where rnum >= #{startNo} and rnum <= #{endNo} order by notice_no desc
select n.*, m.member_name from sp_notice n join sp_member m on n.mem_no_fk = m.member_no where notice_no = #{no}
mapper.update: update sp_notice set notice_hit = notice_hit+1 where notice_no = #{no}
update sp_notice set notice_hit = notice_hit+1 where notice_no = #{no}

choose.when: update sp_notice set notice_title = #{notice_title}, notice_cont = #{notice_cont}, notice_file = #{notice_file} where notice_no = #{notice_no}
